cause.description:
Ok we just want runway models to gain a lil weight because its starting to scare me...freakin toothpicks...dont get me wrong.. anorexia is a real disease we need to teach these models how to eat properly. starting with a trip to mcdonalds..
1. We need to feed models
2. its a real disease and its possibly deadly
3. it doesnt hurt to add a little weight people!
4. if models are supposed to be attractive then whats the point of being anorexic. i dont konw alotta people that get a stiffy from bone thin people
cause.name: FEED THE MODELS!!!
